languages.text: "До чего скверное положение, раз мы вынуждены очертя голову идти туда, куда указывает ксенос-скоморох!"
"We really are in dire straits if we're forced to rush headlong wherever the jester xenos points!"
languages.original_text: "До чего скверное положение, раз мы вынуждены очертя голову идти туда, куда указывает ксенос-скоморох!"

languages.text: « Nous devons vraiment être aux abois si nous en sommes à suivre aveuglément les indications d'un bouffon xénos ! »
languages.original_text: "We really are in dire straits if we're forced to rush headlong wherever the jester xenos points!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons vraiment être aux abois si nous en sommes à suivre aveuglément les indications d'un bouffon xénos ! »

languages.text: “那个异形小丑指到哪，我们就不得不跟着跑到哪。由此可见，我们的情况真是相当不乐观！”
languages.original_text: "We really are in dire straits if we're forced to rush headlong wherever the jester xenos points!"

traits.locale_text: “那个异形小丑指到哪，我们就不得不跟着跑到哪。由此可见，我们的情况真是相当不乐观！”

languages.text: 「あの異種族の道化師が指し示すままどこへでも突き進んじまうようなら、本当にまずい状況になるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "We really are in dire straits if we're forced to rush headlong wherever the jester xenos points!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの異種族の道化師が指し示すままどこへでも突き進んじまうようなら、本当にまずい状況になるぞ！」

languages.text: "Wir müssen wirklich in einer schlimmen Notlage sein, wenn wir kopflos dahin stürzen, wo der Narren-Xenos hinzeigt!"
languages.original_text: "We really are in dire straits if we're forced to rush headlong wherever the jester xenos points!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen wirklich in einer schlimmen Notlage sein, wenn wir kopflos dahin stürzen, wo der Narren-Xenos hinzeigt!"

languages.text: «¡Muy mal pinta la cosa si no nos queda otra que lanzarnos de cabeza adonde nos señale ese bufón xenos!».
languages.original_text: "We really are in dire straits if we're forced to rush headlong wherever the jester xenos points!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Muy mal pinta la cosa si no nos queda otra que lanzarnos de cabeza adonde nos señale ese bufón xenos!».

languages.text: "Şu soytarı zenonun gösterdiği yöne apar topar dalmak zorunda kalıyorsak durumumuz gerçekten kötü demektir."
languages.original_text: "We really are in dire straits if we're forced to rush headlong wherever the jester xenos points!"
